column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Their claim to fame pancake - Berry Bliss tasted like borderline cough syrup to me. Yes
column2: I am Queen Robitussin over here.  It didn't quite cross that mark
column3: but it was close enough for me to make that comparison.  We also had the tiramisu and the oreos pancake and I think my favorite had to be the oreo's one.  What left me the most disappointed was due to the fact that I build so much pressure on it exceeding the hype that these pancakes should've been out-of-this-world good.. I definitely didn't reach that conclusion.
